dcterms:creator: David G. Goodwin
M. Di Renzo
L. Fu
Javier Urzay
Benedetta Franzelli
dcterms:description: The CSTR model from the Cantera library is utilized as a simplified constant volume reactor model to describe the ignition process in the study.
dcterms:title: CSTR model from the Cantera library

dcterms:creator: Mario Di Renzo
Lin Fu
Javier Urzay
dcterms:description: High-fidelity simulations of laser-induced ignition in a prototype rocket combustor are validated using the HTR solver, which is an open-source multi-GPU high-order code.
dcterms:title: High-fidelity simulations of laser-induced ignition in a prototype rocket combustor

dcterms:creator: Benedetta Franzelli
M. Di Renzo
L. Fu
Javier Urzay
dcterms:description: A one-step chemical mechanism with five species and one global reaction is used to model combustion instabilities in a lean partially premixed swirled flame.
dcterms:title: 1 step chemical mechanism with 5 species and 1 global reaction
